mapper.sql: SELECT name name ,korean_name koreanName ,version version /*,type type*/ ,(select B.attribute1desc from common_code B where common_set = 'yeast_type' and A.type = B.common_code) as type ,form form ,amount amount ,amount_is_weight amountIsWeight ,laboratory laboratory ,product_id productId ,min_temperature minTemperature ,max_temperature maxTemperature ,flocculation flocculation ,attenuation attenuation ,notes notes ,best_for bestFor ,times_cultured timesCultured ,max_reuse maxReuse ,add_to_secondary addToSecondary ,insert_id insertId ,insert_date insertDate ,update_id updateId ,update_date updateDate ,delete_id deleteId ,delete_date deleteDate FROM brewduckdb.YEAST A

SELECT b.name name ,b.korean_name koreanName ,b.version version ,b.type type ,b.form form ,b.amount amount ,b.amount_is_weight amountIsWeight ,b.laboratory laboratory ,b.product_id productId ,b.min_temperature minTemperature ,b.max_temperature maxTemperature ,b.flocculation flocculation ,b.attenuation attenuation ,b.notes notes ,b.best_for bestFor ,b.times_cultured timesCultured ,b.max_reuse maxReuse ,b.add_to_secondary addToSecondary ,b.insert_id insertId ,b.insert_date insertDate ,b.update_id updateId ,b.update_date updateDate ,b.delete_id deleteId ,b.delete_date deleteDate FROM brewduckdb.RECIPE_YEAST a ,brewduckdb.YEAST b WHERE a.yeast_name = b.name

select.trim:
AND NAME like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND korean_name like CONCAT('%', #{koreanName}, '%')
AND TYPE != null
AND type = #{type}
AND delete_id IS NULL

mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YEAST WHERE TYPE = 'Ale') aleCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'yeast_type' AND B.common_code = 'Ale') as aleCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YEAST WHERE TYPE = 'Lager') lagerCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'yeast_type' AND B.common_code = 'Lager') as lagerCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YEAST WHERE TYPE = 'Wheat') wheatCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'yeast_type' AND B.common_code = 'Wheat') as wheatCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YEAST WHERE TYPE = 'Wine') wineCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'yeast_type' AND B.common_code = 'Wine') as wineCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YEAST WHERE TYPE = 'Champagne') champagneCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'yeast_type' AND B.common_code = 'Champagne') as champagneCntName FROM DUAL
